hero.title: We build services that help you know your finances
hero.description: From custom analytics platforms to seamless integrations, we develop the financial intelligence tools your business needs to see clearly, act decisively, and keep moving forward.

problem.label: The Challenge
problem.title: Financial tools that don't fit your business
problem.description: Off-the-shelf financial software rarely matches how your business actually works. Data lives in silos, workflows are inefficient, and insights come too late.

1.title: Scattered Data
1.description: Financial information trapped across systems that don't talk to each other.

2.title: Generic Solutions
2.description: Software built for the average case, not your specific needs and workflows.

3.title: Missing Insights
3.description: Without the right tools, you're always reacting to problems instead of spotting them early.

solution.label: Our Approach
solution.title: Software built around how you work
solution.description: We design and develop financial software tailored to your business. Our team of engineers, product managers, and designers works with you to build tools that fit — not the other way around.

technologies.label: Our Stack
technologies.title: Technologies we work with
technologies.description: We use modern, battle-tested technologies to build reliable financial software that scales with your business.

1.question: What kinds of businesses do you work with?
1.answer: We work with businesses that need better financial tooling — from startups building their first internal tools to established companies modernizing legacy systems. If your financial operations involve data that needs to be organized, analyzed, or acted upon, we can probably help.

2.question: How long does a typical project take?
2.answer: It depends on scope. Simple integrations or dashboards might take a few weeks. Larger platforms can take several months. We'll give you a realistic timeline during our initial conversations, and we keep you updated throughout.

3.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
3.answer: Yes, if you want it. We can provide maintenance and support, or we can hand off everything with documentation so your team can manage it independently. We're flexible about what works for you.

4.question: What technologies do you use?
4.answer: We pick the right tools for each project. Our team has experience across modern web technologies, databases, cloud platforms, and various financial APIs. We'll work with your existing infrastructure when it makes sense.

5.question: How do you handle sensitive financial data?
5.answer: Security is built into our process from the start. We follow industry best practices for handling financial data and can work within your existing security policies and compliance requirements.

6.question: Do you use AI in your development process?
6.answer: Yes, we leverage modern AI tools to enhance our productivity and code quality. We use AI assistants for code review, documentation, and accelerating routine tasks — while always maintaining human oversight for critical decisions. This allows us to deliver higher quality solutions faster, while keeping costs reasonable for our clients.

content.intro: We keep it simple. Here's how we handle your data.

1.title: What we collect
1.content: Only what you give us through the contact form: your name, email, and message. That's it. No tracking cookies, no analytics, no third-party scripts watching you.

2.title: What we do with it
2.content: We use your contact info to reply to you. We don't sell it, share it, or use it for marketing. When we're done talking, we don't keep your data around longer than needed.

3.title: Your rights
3.content: Want to know what data we have about you? Want us to delete it? Just email hello@thefiint.com and we'll take care of it.

4.title: Questions
4.content: If you have any questions about how we handle your data, reach out to hello@thefiint.com.
